name: Merrell Nova 2 Mid Waterproof Light Trail Shoes - Men's
categories: Nova 2 Mid Waterproof Light Trail Shoes
description: With the athleticism of a trail runner and the stability of a hiking shoe, the Nova 2 Mid provide you the comfort and traction to tackle the trails. The waterproof construction and the bellows tongue keep water and trail debris out of the shoe, so you can explore the mountains rain or shine.Abrasion-resistant mesh and TPU reinforcements in high-wear areas.Waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry while letting sweat escape.EVA midsole with forefoot and heel cushion pods comforts and stabilizes feet.Air cushion heel absorbs shock for a comfortable ride.TrailProtect rock plate protects underfoot.Vibram® TC5+ rubber outsole with 5mm adaptive lugs keep feet secure on the trail.
